review.reviewBody: The beef and broccoli was our least favourite dish (too salty) but everything else was good.  Portions were large and the price was fair for what was received.  Would order from them again.

Food was wonderful and service was even better, I messed up and ordered pick up when I needed delivery I called the store when I realized and they were incredibly nice helped me out and got my food to me. Will definitely order again.
Great food , a bit pricey , but usually very good .

sweet and sour chicken balls were great   loved the beef with broccoli and the shrimp fried rice was delicious only complaint was the broth for the wonton soup had no flavour and the soup was small portions for its price  we ordered a large and were disappointed overall thou we  really like this place for chinese
Good BBQ pork fu yung.  Best of all it came HOT!  Thanks to the driver.
